DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect dipeptidyl-peptidase 4 inhibitor vascular heal biodegradable polymer base sirolimus elute stent implantation diabetic pateints .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect DPP4 Inhibitor Vasclular Healing
DOC.criteria: NonST segement elevation acute coronary syndrome Left main disease Known hypersensitivity contraindication follow medication : Heparin , aspirin , clopidogrel , sirolimus , siptagliptin statin Congestive heart failure ( patient LVEF < 30 % cardiogenic shock ) Uncontrolled myocardial ischemia ( repeat chest pain dyspnea revascularization ) Uncontrolled ventricular arrhythmia History malignancy chemotherapy Serious hematologic disease ( e.g . CML , MDS ) Current infectious disease need antibiotic therapy Creatinine level > 1.5 mg/dL dependence dialysis Other severe concurrent illness ( e.g . active infection , malignancy ) . Life expectancy less one year Pregnancy woman potential childbearing Type I DM Treatment insulin History pancreatitis Who read informed consent form ( e.g . illiteracy , foreigner )
